item.title: What budget to provide for its intrusion test
item.author: Thibaud Robin
item.description: ðŸ’° How much does a computer intrusion test cost in 2024? Cybersecurity: a 21st-century issue In an ever-evolving digital world, computer intrusion tests are becoming increasingly crucial for ensuring the security of a company’s information systems. ðŸŽ¯ Whether it’s to protect sensitive data or to maintain business operations, cybersecurity is at the heart of every organization’s concerns. One of the most frequent questions that companies ask is the cost of a penetration test in 2024.
